com.spartanlaboratories.engine.game

Class Buff

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spartanlaboratories.engine.structure.StructureObject
      • com.spartanlaboratories.engine.game.GameObject
        • com.spartanlaboratories.engine.game.Buff

  • public abstract class Buff
extends GameObject
    An object that is to be contained inside an Alive's buffs list, it handles all of the temporary and permanent stat changes and special effects of an Alive object.
    Author:
    Spartak

      • tick

        public final boolean tick()
        Description copied from class: GameObject
        Performs one update on the state of this game object. This method is called systematically by the engine and therefore it would be bad practice to call the method externally.
        Overrides:
        tick in class GameObject
        Returns:
        whether or not this object is active
